title: Unable to reply to Support Tickers

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
For some reason my submit button shows up as text & I can't reply to support tickets.

Is something wrong on my end, or is this just a bug?

replies.body: Oh yikes, that's no good. I've passed this along to the team who handles that page so hopefully we can see that fixed soon. In the meantime, let's try using a different browser or a private/incognito window to see if that helps.

I'd love to try a new browser but alas I can't use Chrome over Firefox. It's a RAM hog.

What do you mean by a private window?

Aha! So if you're using Firefox you should be able to right click on the shortcut and click the Private Window option. You can also pull it up after opening a normal window by following the screenshot below ^_^!

Give that a try, but I do want to point out that I've been told this issue has occurred for a few other players as well since you first posted this. 
If a private window doesn't help, go ahead and reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that you can help us track this issue!

https://i.gyazo.com/1cbfe21e37bd59aa3dd58aa5263d423e.png

I tried the private window, still didn't fix it.

I could send in a support ticket, but I wouldn't be able to reply due to this issue. I'll still send one in though.
